public boolean isPreferredDriver()

Note:

Checks if the Java version running starts with 1.4.

Specified by:
isPreferredDriver in interface Driver
Specified by:
isPreferredDriver in class AbstractDriver
Returns:
true if the driver thinks it can handle the current JavaDoc version and thinks it is the best driver for the given version, false otherwise.
